title: PostgreSQL ORDER BY

metadata.description: Learn about PostgreSQL ORDER BY with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Sort Data
The
ORDER BY
keyword is used to sort the result in ascending or descending order.
The
ORDER BY
keyword sorts the records in ascending order by default.
To sort the records in descending order, use the
DESC
keyword.
Example
Sort the table by price:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price;
Run Example »
DESC
The
ORDER BY
keyword sorts the records in ascending order by default.
To sort the records in descending order, use the
DESC
keyword.
Example
Sort the table by price, in descending order:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price DESC;
Run Example »
Sort Alphabetically
For string values the
ORDER BY
keyword will order alphabetically:
Example
Sort the table by product name:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY product_name;
Run Example »
Alphabetically DESC
To sort the table reverse alphabetically, use the
DESC
keyword:
Example
Sort the table by product name, in descending order:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY product_name DESC;
Run Example »

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price;

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY price DESC;

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY product_name;

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM products
ORDER BY product_name DESC;

quiz.question:
What is PostgreSQL ORDER BY

Sort Data
The
ORDER BY
keyword?
options: used to sort the result in ascending or descending order
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of PostgreSQL ORDER BY

Sort Data
The
ORDER BY
keyword is 'used to sort the result in ascending or descending order'.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers PostgreSQL ORDER BY concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PostgreSQL ORDER BY effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PostgreSQL ORDER BY and how to apply it in your projects.
